resources.string: Please check your network connection and try again.

skoob is desigend and developed by Oxpecker for Avishkar 2017. Avishkar is the annual TechFest of MNNIT, Allahabad. Oxpecker is a one member team.\nThe app is a simple e-commerce app for exchange of books in the institute using mutual skoins as well as money. Instead of direct money transactions on the fly we seal a deal with the seller and the buyer just needs to pay the money while receiving the book from the seller. Using skoins lets you buy books from the skoins earned through selling used books. This way students can completely avoid the use of money in exchange of books. We infact offer all new customers with 50 skoins! So what are you waiting for, start skoobing!
